table.name: vtiger_bhscallbackmanagement
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscallbackmanagement` ( `bhscallbackmanagementid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhscallbackmanagement_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscallbackmanagementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscallbackmanagementcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscallbackmanagementcf` ( `bhscallbackmanagementid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscallbackmanagementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
